DOC.brief_title: Excretion Balance Metabolism After Single Oral Dose 14C-Labelled ORM-12741
DOC.detailed_description: Six healthy male receive 3 mg ORM-12741 single oral solution ( 0.1mg/mL ) . The oral dose contain 0.73 mg 14C-ORM-12741 ( 2.5 MBq ) , 1 mg 13C-ORM-12741 1.27 mg ORM-12741 . Subjects confine study site Day -1 ( afternoon prior day dose ) least 168 hour follow drug administration ( Day 8 ) . Subjects discharge Day 8 radioactivity urine faeces meet pre-defined criterion ( urinary excretion < 0.5 % faecal excretion < 0.5 % dose per 24 hour base 14C radioactivity quick count , measure Day 7 onwards ) . If Day 8 pre define criterion meet , subject remain hospitalised maximum seven day ( Day 15 ) criterion meet ( daily check quick count ) . If Day 15 pre define criterion meet , subject discharge request collect 24-hour sample urine and/or faeces home per week deliver clinical research unit Zuidlaren . These weekly collection continue criterion meet . The total duration study approximately 5 - 6 week subject .
